instructions:
Brown ground beef with onions and garlic with olive oil in a 6 quart pot, and drain fat. Add remaining
ingredients except frozen vegetables and tomatoes. Bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Add
tomatoes and frozen vegetables. Return to a boil, cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Serve with Parmesan
cheese. Serves 8. 
*(Rev. 4/5/99)*
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz ea) Swanson's beef broth
1 jar (28 oz) Ragu spaghetti sauce, garden style with mushrooms
name: Zesty Vegetable Soup
creator: Cora Decker
